---
title: "Reproducing WPID's results"
format: html
editor: visual
execute: 
  freeze: true
draft: true
date: "2 July 2023"
categories: [Political Economy]
---


## Switzerland

To analyze the evolution of political cleavages, [Piketty et al (2021)](https://wid.world/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/WorldInequalityLab_WP2021_15_PoliticalCleavages_WesternDemocracies.pdf) compiled datasets covering a lot of countries.


::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
chinc <- read_dta("ch-inc.dta")
names(chinc)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
  [1] "iso"          "isoname"      "year"         "survey"       "source"      
  [6] "type"         "id"           "weightorig"   "vote"         "voteprev"    
 [11] "lrs"          "turnout"      "intpol"       "age"          "educ"        
 [16] "educ2"        "emp"          "house"        "inc"          "marital"     
 [21] "region"       "religion"     "religious"    "rural"        "rural2"      
 [26] "sector"       "sex"          "union"        "educ3"        "region2"     
 [31] "language"     "ctrbirth"     "occup_kriesi" "occup_oesch"  "self"        
 [36] "partyid"      "Group"        "voteleft"     "voteright"    "voteother"   
 [41] "weight"       "votesoci"     "votechri"     "votelibe"     "voteecol"    
 [46] "voteextr"     "voteothe"     "univ"         "year2"        "educ_1"

 [61] "religion_3"   "religion_4"   "sex_1"        "sex_2"        "region_1"    
 [66] "region_2"     "region_3"     "language_1"   "language_2"   "language_3"  
 [71] "ctrbirth_1"   "ctrbirth_2"   "agerec"       "agerec_1"     "agerec_2"    
 [76] "agerec_3"     "surveyid"     "identifier"   "id2"          "dinc_1"      
 [81] "dinc_2"       "dinc_3"       "dinc_4"       "dinc_5"       "dinc_6"      
 [86] "dinc_7"       "dinc_8"       "dinc_9"       "dinc_10"      "dinc"        
 [91] "qinc"         "qinc_1"       "qinc_2"       "qinc_3"       "qinc_4"

[101] "b50"         
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm1 <- lm(data = chinc, voteleft ~ ginc_3 + factor(year) + educ)
summary(lm1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = voteleft ~ ginc_3 + factor(year) + educ, data = chinc)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-0.6117 -0.4013 -0.3214  0.5859  0.8800 

Coefficients:
                  Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)       0.218977   0.016673  13.134  < 2e-16 ***
ginc_3           -0.070445   0.008380  -8.407  < 2e-16 ***
factor(year)1979 -0.115305   0.021381  -5.393 6.97e-08 ***
factor(year)1995 -0.066702   0.016000  -4.169 3.07e-05 ***
factor(year)1999 -0.103853   0.017267  -6.015 1.82e-09 ***
factor(year)2003 -0.079407   0.016168  -4.911 9.09e-07 ***
factor(year)2007 -0.135868   0.016622  -8.174 3.07e-16 ***
factor(year)2011 -0.100260   0.016532  -6.065 1.33e-09 ***
factor(year)2015 -0.159405   0.016477  -9.675  < 2e-16 ***
factor(year)2019 -0.015055   0.016127  -0.934    0.351    
educ              0.130890   0.004706  27.816  < 2e-16 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 0.4824 on 41221 degrees of freedom
  (35899 observations effacées parce que manquantes)
Multiple R-squared:  0.02731,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.02708 
F-statistic: 115.7 on 10 and 41221 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm1975 <- lm(data = chinc[chinc$year == 1975,], voteleft ~ ginc_3, weights = weightorig)
summary(lm1975)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = voteleft ~ ginc_3, data = chinc[chinc$year == 1975, 
    ], weights = weightorig)

Weighted Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max

(Intercept)  0.41838    0.01592  26.281   <2e-16 ***
ginc_3       0.01605    0.04748   0.338    0.735    
---

  (1272 observations effacées parce que manquantes)
Multiple R-squared:  0.0001055,	Adjusted R-squared:  -0.0008178 
F-statistic: 0.1142 on 1 and 1083 DF,  p-value: 0.7354
```
